languages.text: "Я помогу тебе — проведу инспекцию и скажу, как изменить это место в лучшую сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Я помогу тебе — проведу инспекцию и скажу, как изменить это место в лучшую сторону".

languages.text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
languages.original_text: "Я помогу тебе — проведу инспекцию и скажу, как изменить это место в лучшую сторону".

traits.locale_text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I wish to know what life is like for all my subjects. Even the lowliest ones."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I wish to know what life is like for all my subjects. Even the lowliest ones."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."
"I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."

languages.text: "Ich biete Euch hiermit meine Unterstützung an, Captain. Ich werde eine Inspektion durchführen und Euch anschließend wissen lassen, was man in meinen Augen verbessern könnte."
languages.original_text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."

traits.locale_text: "Ich biete Euch hiermit meine Unterstützung an, Captain. Ich werde eine Inspektion durchführen und Euch anschließend wissen lassen, was man in meinen Augen verbessern könnte."
"Ich will wissen, wie alle meine Untertanen leben. Selbst die niedersten von ihnen."

languages.text: « Je suis ici pour vous aider, capitaine. Je vais inspecter les lieux, après quoi je vous ferai part de mes suggestions pour améliorer les choses. »
languages.original_text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ici pour vous aider, capitaine. Je vais inspecter les lieux, après quoi je vous ferai part de mes suggestions pour améliorer les choses. »
« J'aimerais savoir quelle vie mènent mes sujets. Même les plus modestes. »

languages.text: «Le ofrezco mi ayuda, capitán. Llevaré a cabo una inspección y luego le daré mi opinión sobre cómo podrían mejorarse las condiciones de este lugar».
languages.original_text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."

traits.locale_text: «Le ofrezco mi ayuda, capitán. Llevaré a cabo una inspección y luego le daré mi opinión sobre cómo podrían mejorarse las condiciones de este lugar».
«Quiero saber cómo viven todos mis súbditos. Incluso los más humildes».

languages.text: 「ここに援助を申し出よう、中隊長。視察を行い、その上でここをいい方向へと変えるための方法について、考えを述べるとしよう」
languages.original_text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."

traits.locale_text: 「ここに援助を申し出よう、中隊長。視察を行い、その上でここをいい方向へと変えるための方法について、考えを述べるとしよう」
「私は、すべての臣民がどのような生活をしているのかを知りたいのだ。最下層のものも含めてね」

languages.text: “我是来协助你的，上尉。我准备视察一下这片甲板，之后打算和你说说我的想法，看看该怎么把这个地方变得更好。”
languages.original_text: "I hereby offer you my assistance, Captain. I shall conduct an inspection and then share my thoughts on how to change this place for the better."

traits.locale_text: “我是来协助你的，上尉。我准备视察一下这片甲板，之后打算和你说说我的想法，看看该怎么把这个地方变得更好。”
“我想了解我的臣民们都过着怎样的生活，哪怕是最底层的臣民也不例外。”
